title: Quality  , Precision Machining (CNC Machine Shop)
companyName: Intellectual Capital Hr Consulting Pvt Ltd
tagsAndSkills: Quality,CNC Machine Shop,Miniature Components,Precision Machining,Customer Quality,Final Quality,CMM,Poka-Yoke
jobDescription:
US MNC : Sr. Engineer / Engineer : Quality (Precision : CNC Machine Shop) @ Navi Mumbai

Our client is a recognized leading expert in precision motion control solutions, to various industrial applications that solve the motion needs of a spectrum of end markets. They are part of large Group, which is a leading, global manufacturer of airflow, motion control, power transmission, & power generation solutions used in commercial, industrial & residential settings. Global Headcount of group exceeds 29000

  • Department: Quality
  • Reports To: Manager - Quality

Position Summary:

  • This position is responsible for quality assurance of the CNC Machine Shop division primarily responsible for producing miniature machined components.
  • Position is responsible to actively drive quality assurance processes.

Education &/Or Experience:

  • B.E./Diploma in Mechanical/Production/industrial engineering with 5 - 8 years of experience In QA with CNC Machine Shop.
  • Extensive machining & shop floor experience, preferably from industrial I.e., Electromechanical Miniature Components , Oil & gas, Energy

Essential Duties & Responsibilities:

  • Overall responsibility of manufactured machined parts, final quality & customer quality.
  • Responsible for IQC / PQC/ OQC related activities
  • Quality targets achievement through Root causes analysis & CAPA.
  • Hands on experiences on Carl Zeiss CMM & L1 program knowledge
  • Helps with getting down to the Root Cause of the Issues & works with the Engineering teams to resolve & Validate the Fixes
  • Resolve quality-related issues & rejections in a timely manner.
  • Implementing the calibration & MSA schedule for instruments & Gauges
  • Handling Change Control process by coordinating with CFT team
  • Interaction with internal/external & international customers issues
  • Decide on the inspection & testing parameters
  • Continuous focus on problem solving & improving process & change control documents
  • Plan & implement process internal audits
  • Training engineers & operators on Quality System
  • Preparation of QA documents pertaining to APQP, PPAP & PSW signoff

Functional Competencies:

  • Knowledge of quality assurance tools, drawing reading, GD & T & inspection methodology
  • Hands-on experience using measuring instruments i.e., micrometers, profile projectors CMM, surface roughness tester, bore gauges, pin gauges, gear roll tester, VMS etc.
  • Expertise in 7QC Tools, FMEA, SPC, Control charts, Shop floor practices.
  • Problem solving through Six sigma methodology Value added
  • Good knowledge & implementation of Poka-Yoke, Kaizen & 5-S
  • Ensure that the organizations Quality Management System conforms to customer, internal, ISO:9001, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001, ISO 13485 standards, & regulatory/legal requirements.
  • Report to top management on the performance of the QMS (e.g., results of quality audits, corrective actions), including the need for improvement.
  • Ensures Engineering Teams are adhering to all the Quality Controls in place. Also validates the complete traceability to the requirements enabling the teams to be Audit Ready.
  • Hands on experience to lead quality standards & manpower management

Key Relationships:

  • Internal: Heads of Operations, Manufacturing, R&D, Supply chain, Planning etc.
  • External: Customers, Sales & marketing

Personal Trait Profile:

  • Work behaviors: Demonstrated the ability to work independently as well as in a team.
  • Leadership: Offers constructive ideas & suggestion for team building & process development.
  • Setting & Meeting commitments: Estimates for own commitments & influences establishment of schedules & work assignments in a team environment.

Managerial Competencies:

  • Proactive & Assertive
  • High analytical ability & coordination skills
  • Communication skills: Possesses excellent oral & written communications
  • Motivate & lead the team
  • Takes initiative

Language Skills: Fluent Hindi / Marathi. Fluent English, oral & written


Industry:

  • Miniature machined component industry
  • Aerospace components manufacturing industry
  • Auto-components
  • Electrical Motor Manufacturing
  • Electrical components

You are requested to E Mail updated Resume with the following details

  • Current Location
  • Pl. Confirm you are ready to work in Mumbai
  • Total Experience Manufacturing Quality function (In years)
  • Relevant experience in CNC Machine Shop division producing miniature machined components. (In years)
  • Do you have extensive machining & shop floor experience ( in Micron accuracy) Aerospace Components , Electromechanical & Miniature Machined Components. Electrical Motor Manufacturing , Electrical components Miniature Auto-components , Oil & Gas, Energy etc.
  • Please specify , Minimum Tolerance ( In Micron) of Components , you have achieved
  • Please specify , List of CNC / Turn mill Machines familiar with
  • Can you undertake Overall quality responsibility of manufactured machined parts, final quality & customer quality.
  • Can you take responsibility of IQC / PQC/ OQC related activities?
  • Can you achieve Quality targets achievement through Root causes analysis & CAPA?
  • Do you have hands on experiences on Carl Zeiss CMM & L1 program knowledge?
  • Can you help with getting down to the Root Cause of the Issues & works with the Engineering teams to resolve & Validate the Fixes?
  • Can you prepare QA documents pertaining to APQP, PPAP & PSW signoff ?
  • Do you have knowledge of quality assurance tools, drawing reading, GD & T & inspection methodology?
  • Do you have hands on experience using measuring instrument i.e., micrometers, profile projectors CMM, surface roughness tester, bore gauges, pin gauges, gear roll tester, VMS etc.
  • Do you have expertise in 7QC Tools, FMEA, SPC, Control charts, Shop floor practices.
  • Can you solve problem through Six Sigma Methodology(Value added)
  • Do you have Good knowledge & implementation of Poka-Yoke, Kaizen & 5-S
  • Can you ensure that the organizations Quality Management System conforms to customer, internal, ISO:9001, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001, ISO 13485 standards, & regulatory/legal requirements.
  • Can you report to top management on the performance of the QMS (e.g., results of quality audits, corrective actions), including the need for improvement.
  • Current Salary (Fixed + Variable)
  • Expected Salary
  • Minimum period required for Joining
  • Can you speak & write Fluent English?
  • Languages Known : Out of English ,Hindi & Marathi(R,W,S)
  • Contact Details, Residence & Mobile No
  • Skype ID / WhatsApp No
  • Age / Birth date

In case you are not interested, we would appreciate, if you can refer us, suitable matching profiles from your rich contacts.
